text: Yuanshan is a metro station on the Tamsui-Xinyi Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code is R14. == Station layout information == The station platforms are above ground level. Platform 1 is for Tamsui or Beitou and Platform 2 is for Xiangshan or Daan. This is the last station above ground level on the line to Xiangshan. == Around the station == * Lin An Tai Historical House and Museum Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Yuanshan metro station
